title: Capital and asset quality of banks, NBFCs remain healthy, says RBI in its annual report
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) released its annual report on Thursday. It highlighted that the capital and asset quality of banks and Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFCs) have stayed robust. This has fostered growth in bank credit and domestic activity for the financial year 2024.
